column5: Who has better pricing between the 2. I am heading up today to look at a new fish finder have never been to radio world but heard they have good prices just wondering if its worth going to

For the complete package of service, even after sales, pricing and pure knowledge I would give Jocelyn a call at Angling Outfitters in Woodstock @ 519-539-5494 and tell him Gavin told you to call.  He knows me well  better than I would like my wife to know  Cheers, G.
Hands Down, Radio World.  Call Jack before you go - you'll see.
radioworld.ca check prices, call BPS to compare. If its only a few bucks difference then Radioworld.ca all the way. Great service from them. Pretty sure you could price match with RadioWorld anyhow.
Radioworld.  Prices are better and I have had nothing but good experiences there.

Radioworld. They are seen all of my electronics business over the past 6 years or more. GPS's , fishfinders, VHF radio, service and pricing keeps me going back. As well as the location. Heard some good things about Angling Outfitters but just not as close for me to get there.
Almost to radio world thanks for the info. The place in woodstock is a little far
